DOC.brief_title: Zoledronic Acid Treatment Spontaneous Osteonecrosis Knee
DOC.criteria: Adults 4085 year age Diagnosis painful osteonecrosis knee within last month . Intravenous ( iv ) bisphosphonates within last 2 year . Abnormal thyroid , kidney liver function . Abnormal blood calcium alkaline phosphatase level . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
